name: Green Grow
description:
Made For the Devlaunchers game jam

The web build may be laggy/buggy so  i included a downloadable version

Controls:

Movement = WASD

Restart = R

Mute Music = F

Gameplay:

you Play as this little blob that is trying to find his way back home

However to enter the next level he has to collect 3 growth orbs wich make him Grow But also decrease his abilty to jump and sprint

Since its made for a game jam it currently only has 4 levels

Credits:

Lifegamer15 - Programming

Kingstrong14 - Art
